vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Simeon(?) living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.35;
son of: Seraiah (H8304K);
father of: Jehu (H3058J)
§ Josibiah = "Jehovah causes to dwell"
a Simeonite, father of Jehu
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Seraías; tribu de Simeón
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
約示比 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "耶和華使我安居"
西緬人耶戶的父親 (代上4:35)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
约示比 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "耶和华使我安居"
西缅人耶户的父亲 (代上4:35)
